Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
_ADLApplicationDataStructure containing information about an application
_ADLApplicationDataX2Structure containing information about an application
_ADLApplicationProfileStructure containing information about an application profile
_ADLControllerModeStructure containing information about an controller mode
_ADLECCDataStructure containing ECC statistics namely SEC counts and DED counts Single error count - count of errors that can be corrected Doubt Error Detect - count of errors that cannot be corrected
_ADLOD6CapabilitiesStructure containing information about Overdrive 6 capabilities
_ADLOD6CapabilitiesExStructure containing information about Overdrive 6 extension capabilities
_ADLOD6CurrentStatusStructure containing information about current Overdrive 6 performance status
_ADLOD6FanSpeedInfoStructure containing information about Overdrive 6 fan speed information
_ADLOD6FanSpeedValueStructure containing information about Overdrive 6 fan speed value
_ADLOD6MaxClockAdjustStructure containing information about Overdrive 6 extension recommended maximum clock adjustment values
_ADLOD6ParameterRangeStructure containing information about Overdrive 6 clock range
_ADLOD6PerformanceLevelStructure containing information about Overdrive 6 clock values
_ADLOD6PowerControlInfoStructure containing information about Overdrive 6 PowerControl settings
_ADLOD6StateExStructure containing information about Overdrive 6 extension state information
_ADLOD6StateInfoStructure containing information about Overdrive 6 clocks
_ADLOD6ThermalControllerCapsStructure containing information about Overdrive 6 thermal contoller capabilities
_ADLOD6VoltageControlInfoStructure containing information about Overdrive 6 PowerControl settings
_PropertyRecordStructure containing information of a property of an application profile
AdapterInfoStructure containing information about the graphics adapter
ADLActivatableSourceStructure containing information about the activatable source
ADLAdapterCapsX2Structure containing information about an controller mode including Number of Connectors
ADLAdapterDisplayCapStructure containing information about the adapter display manner
ADLAdapterLocationStructure containing information about adapter location
ADLAdapterODClockConfigStructure containing the Overdrive clock configuration
ADLAdapterODClockInfoStructure containing the Overdrive clock information
ADLAdjustmentinfoStructure containing information about overlay adjustment
ADLAVIInfoPacketStructure containing the AVI packet info of a display
ADLBezelOffsetSteppingSizeStructure containing information about the Adapter offset stepping size
ADLBiosInfoStructure containing information about the BIOS
ADLBracketSlotInfoStructure containing the slot information
ADLClockInfoStructure containing information about Clock
ADLConnectionDataStructure containing connection information
ADLConnectionPropertiesStructure containing connection properties information
ADLConnectionStateStructure containing connection state of the connector
ADLConnectorInfoStructure containing the Connector information
ADLControllerOverlayInfoStructure containing information about controller overlay information
ADLControllerOverlayInputStructure containing information about input of controller overlay adjustment
ADLCrossfireCombStructure containing information about the proper CrossfireX chains combinations
ADLCrossfireInfoStructure containing CrossfireX state and error information
ADLCustomModeStructure containing information about component video custom modes
ADLDDCInfoStructure containing DDC information
ADLDDCInfo2Structure containing DDC information
ADLDetailedTimingStructure containing detailed timing parameters
ADLDevicePortStructure containing port information
ADLDisplayConfigStructure containing HDTV information for display calls
ADLDisplayDPMSTInfoStructure containing information about the display port MST device
ADLDisplayEDIDDataStructure containing information about EDID data
ADLDisplayIDStructure containing information about the display device
ADLDisplayIdentifierStructure containing information about a display
ADLDisplayInfoStructure containing information about the display device
ADLDisplayMapStructure containing information about display mapping
ADLDisplayModeStructure containing the display mode definition used per controller
ADLDisplayModeInfoStructure containing display mode information
ADLDisplayModeX2Structure containing the display mode definition used per controller
ADLDisplayPropertyStructure containing information about display property
ADLDisplayTargetStructure containing information about display target information
ADLFanSpeedInfoStructure containing information about thermal controller fan speed
ADLFanSpeedValueStructure containing information about fan speed reported by thermal controller
ADLGammaStructure containing information controller Gamma settings
ADLGetClocksOUTStructure containing Clock information for OD5 calls
ADLGLSyncGenlockConfigStructure containing GL-Sync Genlock settings
ADLGlSyncModeStructure containing GL-Sync mode of a display
ADLGlSyncMode2Structure containing GL-Sync mode of a display
ADLGLSyncModuleIDStructure containing GL-Sync module information
ADLGLSyncPortCapsStructure containing GL-Sync ports capabilities
ADLGlSyncPortControlStructure containing GL-Sync port control settings
ADLGlSyncPortInfoStructure containing GL-Sync port information
ADLI2CStructure containing information about I2C
ADLInfoPacketStructure containing the packet info of a display
ADLMemoryDisplayFeaturesStructure containing information about the features associated with a display
ADLMemoryInfoStructure containing information about the ASIC memory
ADLMemoryRequiredStructure containing information about memory required by type
ADLModeStructure containing information about display mode
ADLMSTRadStructure containing MST branch information
ADLMVPUCapsStructure containing information about MultiVPU capabilities
ADLMVPUStatusStructure containing information about MultiVPU status
ADLODClockSettingStructure containing the Overdrive clock setting
ADLODParameterRangeStructure containing the range of Overdrive parameter
ADLODParametersStructure containing information about Overdrive parameters
ADLODPerformanceLevelStructure containing information about Overdrive level
ADLODPerformanceLevelsStructure containing information about Overdrive performance levels
ADLPMActivityStructure containing information about current power management related activity
ADLPossibleMapStructure containing information about the display device possible map for one GPU
ADLPossibleMappingStructure containing information about display possible mapping
ADLPossibleMapResultStructure containing information about the validated display device possible map result
ADLPossibleSLSMapStructure containing information about the display Possible SLS Map information
ADLPowerControlInfoStructure containing information about an OD5 Power Control feature
ADLPXConfigCapsStructure containing information about driver supported PowerExpress Config Caps
ADLSLSGridStructure containing information about the display SLS Grid information
ADLSLSMapStructure containing information about the display SLS Map information
ADLSLSModeStructure containing information about the display SLS Mode information
ADLSLSOffsetStructure containing information about the display SLS Offset information
ADLSLSTargetStructure containing information about the SLS targets
ADLSupportedConnectionsStructure containing supported connection types and properties
ADLTemperatureStructure containing information about thermal controller temperature
ADLThermalControllerInfoStructure containing information about thermal controller
tagADLBezelTransientModeStructure containing information about the display SLS bezel Mode information
XScreenInfoStructure containing information about the Linux X screen information
